TopicTitle: KSP 0.90 'Beta Than Ever' Grand Discussion Thread!

Articles.Content:
Seriously the update just came out and all you have to say is this????? XD

I am excited for the update(Though admittedly I can't comment on my experience in game yet because it's not downloaded yet). I am just curious about this. From what I've seen so far this update looks great
Does the scientist bonus stack? So 3 Science Kerbals get me a 60% science bonus?

Yeh, I am eyewitnessing this great moment! Feels wonderful!

Download finished - got to go play...

Won't download:

Error Message:

Warning: session_start(): The session id is too long or contains illegal characters, valid characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and '-,' in /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php on line 9

Warning: session_start(): Cannot send session cookie - headers already sent by (output started at /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php:9) in /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php on line 9

Warning: session_start(): Cannot send session cache limiter - headers already sent (output started at /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php:9) in /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php on line 9

Warning: Cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/config.php:9) in /host/www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/htdocs/lib/multiplayDwn.php on line 11

Invalid Token
Thank you Squad. Time to update signature.
And starting up. Awesome release-timing btw!

Server overloaded, try again in a few minutes or from a different browser (this error also pops up in Chrome from time to time)
Is 64 windiws stable
I hope it is actually downloadingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ The patcher says that it is "Now synchronizing with the master server. Please Wait."
did we get performance improvments???

Oh wow!

It's finally here!

I was right about maxmaps being uber cyrptic!

And the hypeTrain thread broke 100 pages! I was decorating the HypeTree (Sleepdriving the hypeTrain) at the time, and did not notice! OMG!

Sorry I just saw the Mod update on prior page, server is overloaded -- try a browser other than Chrome, or just keep trying. I finally got it to start!

Excited to go play! BREAK ALL THE MODS!

Edited December 15, 2014 by Holyvision
just got home from school. downloading now. YAY!

I love you all so much

bask in my happiness

0.90 is here praise it

Gonna be downloaded in 2 hours or so from steam, can't wait!

(I have a feeling i'm gonna like the spaceplane parts )

Downloading now. And holy cow it's downloading fast compared to past updates.

Agreed. Being as your're a video maker (and a good one at that), I was wondering if you got a pre-release version?
Choo choo! The hype train... it's here... but it's not stopping!!!

Server overloaded, try again in a few minutes or from a different browser (this error also pops up in Chrome from time to time)

Meh, this happens every update. Do you guys plan to get better servers?
That was unexpected. Amaze balls!

Downloaded!

See you chumps guys later!
And here I was thinking they would release it on Christmas. You didn't even give SWDennis enough time for the third hype plane video! Anyway, gotta go play the update!

Gonna be downloaded in 2 hours or so from steam, can't wait!

(I have a feeling i'm gonna like the spaceplane parts )

I've got a few days to wait, bloody slow internet.

30 minute download.

...Mother of God...
